Id: ancrecommendationa2
Type:
system: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/library-type
code: logic-library
Version: 0.1.0
Status: active
Related:

type: depends-on

Resource:
Library/fhirhelpers

type: depends-on

Resource:
Library/anccommon

Data Requirements:

type: EpisodeOfCare

code filter:
path: type valueset:

type: Condition

code filter:
path: code valueset:

type: Observation

code filter:
path: code valueset:

type: Procedure

code filter:
path: code valueset:

path: code valueset:

path: code valueset:

Content: type: text/cql 
library ANCRecommendationA2 version '0.1.0'

using FHIR version '4.0.0'

include FHIRHelpers version '4.0.0' called FHIRHelpers
include ANCCommon version '0.1.0' called Common

/* codesystem "LOINC": 'http://loinc.org'
code "Hb": '718-7' from "LOINC" display 'Haemoglobin measured from haemoglobinometer (g/dl)' */
code "Hb": '165395AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from Common.OpenMRSEntity display 'Haemoglobin measured from haemoglobinometer (g/dl)'
code "Iron Intake Compliance": '165272AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from Common.OpenMRSEntity display 'Iron intake compliance'
code "Iron Side Effects": '165273AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from Common.OpenMRSEntity display 'Iron side effects' // NOTE: OpenMRS concept is just side effects from medication

code "Active Condition": 'active' from Common."Condition Clinical Status Codes"

// TODO: How do parameters like this get configured for local/site usage
//parameter "Anaemia Prevalence" System.Quantity default 40 '%'

context Patient

// TODO: Configuring in-line directly for now
define "Population Anaemia Prevalence": 21 '%'

/*
IAF - Iron and Folic Acid Supplements

RECOMMENDATION A.2.1: Daily oral iron and folic acid supplementation with 30 mg to
60 mg of elemental iron and 400 μg (0.4 mg) folic acid is recommended for pregnant
women to prevent maternal anaemia, puerperal sepsis, low birth weight, and preterm birth.
(Recommended)

RECOMMENDATION A.2.2: Intermittent oral iron and folic acid supplementation with 120 mg
of elemental iron and 2800 μg (2.8 mg) of folic acid once weekly is recommended for pregnant
women to improve maternal and neonatal outcomes if daily iron is not acceptable due to sideeffects,
and in populations with an anaemia prevalence among pregnant women of less than
20%. (Context-specific recommendation)

On every contact,
 if anaemia detected
   recommend 120 mg of elemental iron daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
 else if population anaemia prevalence >= 40%
   recommend 60 mg of elemental iron and 400 μg of folic acid, daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
 else if population anaemia prevalence < 20% or daily iron not acceptable due to side-effects
   recommend intermittent oral iron: 120 mg of oral iron, and 2.8 mg of folic acid, weekly (Recommendation A.2.2)
 else
   recommend 30 to 60 mg of elemental iron and 400 μg of folic acid, daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
 check iron-intake compliance;
 check iron-side effects;

Has Anaemia
 Hb Concentration < 11 g/dL and Gestational Age < 12 weeks or Gestational Age > 28 weeks
 Hb Concentration < 10.5 g/dL and Gestational Age between 13 weeks and 27 weeks
*/

// if anaemia detected
define "Has Anaemia":
 if Common.gest_age between 13 weeks and 27 weeks then
   "Hb Concentration" < 10.5 'g/dL'
 else
   "Hb Concentration" < 11 'g/dL'

define "Hb Concentration":
 First(
   ["Observation": "Hb"] O
     where O.status = 'final'
       and (O.effective as FHIR.Period) after start of Common.pregnancy.period
     sort by FHIRHelpers.ToDateTime(effective as FHIR.dateTime) descending
 ).value as Quantity

// else if population anaemia prevalence >= 40%
define "Treat for High Anaemia Prevalence":
 "Is High Anaemia Prevalence"
   and not "Has Anaemia"

define "Is High Anaemia Prevalence":
 "Population Anaemia Prevalence" >= 40 '%'

// else if population anaemia prevalence < 20% or daily iron not acceptable due to side-effects
define "Treat for Low Anaemia Prevalence or Iron Side Effects":
 "Has Low Anaemia Prevalence or Iron Side Effects"
   and not "Has Anaemia"

define "Has Low Anaemia Prevalence or Iron Side Effects":
 "Population Anaemia Prevalence" < 20 '%'
   or "Has Iron Side-Effects"

define "Has Iron Side-Effects":
 exists (
   ["Condition": "Iron Side Effects"] C
     where C.onset on or after start of Common.pregnancy.period
       and exists (
         C.clinicalStatus.coding Coding
           where FHIRHelpers.ToCode(Coding) ~ "Active Condition"
       )
 )

define "Should Receive Standard Supplements":
 not "Has Anaemia"
   and not "Is High Anaemia Prevalence"
   and not "Has Low Anaemia Prevalence or Iron Side Effects"
/*
define "Get Summary":
 'This is the summary'

define "Get Detail":
 'This is the detail'

define "Get Indicator":
 'warning' */

normal", "trigger": [ { "type": "named-event", "name": "anc-contact" } ], "condition": [ { "kind": "applicability", "expression": { "language": "text/cql", "expression": "ANCRecommendationA2."Has Id: anccommon
Type:
system: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/library-type
code: logic-library
Version: 0.1.0
Status: active
Related:

type: depends-on

Resource:
Library/fhirhelpers

Data Requirements:

type: EpisodeOfCare

code filter:
path: type valueset:

type: Condition

code filter:
path: code valueset:

type: Observation

code filter:
path: code valueset:

type: Procedure

code filter:
path: code valueset:

type: Observation

code filter:
path: code valueset:

Content: type: text/cql 
library ANCCommon version '0.1.0'

using FHIR version '4.0.0'

include FHIRHelpers version '4.0.0'

codesystem SNOMEDCT: 'http://snomed.info/sct'
codesystem ANCCodes: 'http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/CodeSystem/anc-codes'
codesystem OpenMRSEntity: 'http://openmrs.org/concepts'
codesystem "Condition Clinical Status Codes": 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-clinical'

//For Dev only:
codesystem EpisodeOfCareType: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/episodeofcare-type'

/* valueset "Active Condition": 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-clinical' */

code "ANC Pregnancy Case": 'hacc' from EpisodeOfCareType
/* code "ANC Pregnancy Case": 'TBD' from ANCCodes */
code LMP: '1427AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from OpenMRSEntity display 'Date of last menstrual period'
code UltrasoundGA: '165220AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from OpenMRSEntity display 'Gestational age in weeks from ultrasound'
code FundalHeight: '1439AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from OpenMRSEntity display 'FUNDAL HEIGHT'
code "Weeks of gestational age": '1438AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' from OpenMRSEntity display 'Weeks of gestational age'
code "Pregnancy (finding)": 'TBD' from SNOMEDCT
code "Ultrasound (procedure)": 'TBD' from SNOMEDCT
//code "Selected Gestational Age Method": 'TBD' from ANCCodes
code "Selected Gestational Age Method": 'GestAgeMethod' from OpenMRSEntity
code "UseLMP": 'UseLMP' from ANCCodes
code "UseUltrasound": 'UseUltrasound' from ANCCodes
code "UseSFH": 'UseSFH' from ANCCodes

code "Active Condition": 'active' from "Condition Clinical Status Codes"

context Patient

// Overall use an EpisodeOfCare to track the state of the pregnancy
// The EpisodeOfCare will be associated with a Pregnancy Condition
// Encounters will be used within the EpisodeOfCare to track "Contacts"

define pregnancy:
 First(
   ["EpisodeOfCare": type in "ANC Pregnancy Case"] E
     sort by start of period descending
 )

define function GetId(reference String):
 Last(Split(reference, '/'))

define pregnancyCondition:
 ["Condition": code in "Pregnancy (finding)"] C
   where C.id = GetId(First(pregnancy.diagnosis).condition.reference)
     and exists (
       C.clinicalStatus.coding Coding
         where FHIRHelpers.ToCode(Coding) ~ "Active Condition"
     )
     // TODO: verificationStatus? provision | confirmed?

// Patient resource
// EpisodeOfCare
// Does the patient have an active EpisodeOfCare with an associated Condition of Pregnant
// Condition
// Encounter to track each visit

define lmp:
 First(
   ["Observation": code in "LMP"] O
     where O.status = 'final' // TODO: Verify status here
       and O.issued on or after start of pregnancy.period
     return FHIRHelpers.ToDateTime(O.value)
     sort desc
 )

define lmp_known: not(lmp is null)

define lmp_edd: lmp + 7 days + 9 months

define lmp_gest_age_weeks: (days between lmp and Today()) div 7
define lmp_gest_age_remainder: (days between lmp and Today()) mod 7

define ultrasoundProcedures:
 ["Procedure": code in "Ultrasound (procedure)"] P
   where P.status = 'completed'
     and P.performed during pregnancy.period

define select_gest_age_edd:
 First(
   ["Observation": code in "Selected Gestational Age Method"] O
     where O.status = 'final'
       and O.issued on or after start of pregnancy.period
     sort by issued desc
 ).value as CodeableConcept

//define GestationalAgeFromLMP:
 // Calculate from LMP if known
 // Observation from Ultrasound
 // Observation from SFH or abdominal palpitation
 // If Gestational Age and Estimated Due Date are calculated from different values, health worker should select gestational age

// TODO:
define ultrasound_gest_age_weeks: null as Integer

// TODO:
define ultrasound_edd: null as DateTime

// TODO:
define sfh_gest_age_weeks: null as Integer

// TODO:
define sfh_edd: null as DateTime

define gest_age:
 case
   when "UseLMP" in FHIRHelpers.ToConcept(select_gest_age_edd).codes then lmp_gest_age_weeks
   when "UseUltrasound" in FHIRHelpers.ToConcept(select_gest_age_edd).codes then ultrasound_gest_age_weeks
   when "UseSFH" in FHIRHelpers.ToConcept(select_gest_age_edd).codes then sfh_gest_age_weeks
   else null
 end

define edd:
 case FHIRHelpers.ToConcept(select_gest_age_edd)
   when "UseLMP" then lmp_edd
   when "UseUltrasound" then ultrasound_edd
   when "UseSFH" then sfh_edd
   else null
 end

define "Up to 12 Weeks":
 gest_age <= 12

define "20 weeks gestation":
 gest_age = 20

define "26 weeks gestation":
 gest_age = 26

define "30 weeks gestation":
 gest_age = 30

define "34 weeks gestation":
 gest_age = 34

define "36 weeks gestation":
 gest_age = 36

define "38 weeks gestation":

 gest_age = 40
